title: The Galaxy S24 series said to get one of Galaxy S25's best features
description: Amidst the rather underwhelming news about older Galaxy phones missing some AI features from One UI 7 due to hardware limitations, we now get an optimistic report claiming the Galaxy S24 series will likely get one of the best One UI 7 features - Audio Eraser. For those unaware, Audio Eraser lets you adjust the volume or completely remove certain sounds from a video, say wind, passing cars or other city sounds. And according to an X post, the functionality will be made available to the Galaxy S24 series once the One UI 7.0 update arrives. Moreover, the Best Face feature will also...
excerpt: Some other features are also confirmed for the Galaxy S23 and S22 series. Amidst the rather underwhelming news about older Galaxy phones missing some AI...
text: Amidst the rather underwhelming news about older Galaxy phones missing some AI features from One UI 7 due to hardware limitations, we now get an optimistic report claiming the Galaxy S24 series will likely get one of the best One UI 7 features - Audio Eraser. For those unaware, Audio Eraser lets you adjust the volume or completely remove certain sounds from a video, say wind, passing cars or other city sounds. And according to an X post, the functionality will be made available to the Galaxy S24 series once the One UI 7.0 update arrives. Moreover, the Best Face feature will also come with One UI 7.0 for Galaxy S24, S23 and S22 series. The Log Video option, however, is confirmed only for the Galaxy S24 Ultra, and it's unknown whether the vanilla S24 and S24+ will receive it. html:
Amidst the rather underwhelming news about older Galaxy phones missing some AI features from One UI 7 due to hardware limitations, we now get an optimistic report claiming the Galaxy S24 series will likely get one of the best One UI 7 features - Audio Eraser.

For those unaware, Audio Eraser lets you adjust the volume or completely remove certain sounds from a video, say wind, passing cars or other city sounds. And according to an X post, the functionality will be made available to the Galaxy S24 series once the One UI 7.0 update arrives.

Moreover, the Best Face feature will also come with One UI 7.0 for Galaxy S24, S23 and S22 series. The Log Video option, however, is confirmed only for the Galaxy S24 Ultra, and it's unknown whether the vanilla S24 and S24+ will receive it.
